snippet.title: Quest Arrest Official Trailer (Gameboy)
snippet.description:
Quest Arrest finally has a release date! March 1st, 2020 Quest Arrest will be available for download and online play! Physical copies scheduled to be released not long after!

 Quest Arrest is an adventure RPG game that takes place in an open world setting. You are a detective that solves crimes and stops criminals!

Follow @QuestArrest on Twitter for more updates.
